metadata.dc:title: The M.A.O.F.E.S.W [Massachusetts Association Opposed to the Further Extension of Suffrage to Woman]
metadata.dc:creator: Alice Stone Blackwell
Blackwell, Alice Stone, 1857-1950.
metadata.dc:subject: Women's rights
metadata.dc:description:
A rebuttal of Massachusetts Association Opposed to the Further Extension of Suffrage to Woman. Source Publication: Political equality series ; v. 2, no. 4. National American Woman Suffrage Association.
Scanned from the holdings of The Research Libraries of The New York Public Library, New York, New York.
